# The Queen's Flower

| runtime        = 20 minutes
| country        = Romania
| language       = Romanian
| budget         =
}}
'The Queen's Flower' () is a 1946 Romanian short film directed by Paul Călinescu. It was entered into the 1946 Cannes Film Festival.
Cast
* Ioana Călinescu
* Ileana Niculescu
* Traian Vrajbă
